about_the_game:
So you love Space For Sale and want to stand out among your fellow space explorers? The Supporter Pack is just what you need! By supporting the development of the game, you'll gain access to a collection of unique and stylish cosmetic items:

Included in the Supporter Pack is the extra stylish astronaut kit – created especially for the adventuring kind of space realtor. It comes with extra thick bags, a smooth linen interior, and the C.A.P. addon – a state-of-the-art protection system against solar distractions.

In addition to this, the Supporter Pack also includes a premium wrench, allowing its wielder to solve all manner of problems - without compromising their personal look.

Important note: By purchasing this DLC, you're primarily supporting the game's development and our team. The exclusive items above are just the cherry on top!
